December 10, 2024

Paper Accepted at ACL 2025

Our paper “Cross-Linguistic Transfer in Multilingual Language Models” has been accepted for publication at ACL 2025.

Abstract: We present a comprehensive analysis of cross-linguistic transfer in state-of-the-art multilingual models. Our results show that…

The paper will be presented by lead author Dr. Sarah Johnson at the conference in June.
